title: Seal of the White House
content:
Which font is used on the Seal of the White House and in the Seal of the President of the United States?

Circus Seals are more fun!

Um. I’m not sure it’s officially called the White House seal, but assuming you’re referring to the [blue plaque](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205015723/http:/media.npr.org/blogs/talk/whitehouse.jpg) that hangs behind the lectern in the WH press center and appears on the banner at [whitehouse.gov](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205015723/http:/www.whitehouse.gov/index.html), the font on the plaque and the seal are not exactly the same — the capital W, if nothing else.
